creator: hlship@apache.org
text:
Occasionally, I have a script that collects a password from the user (as part of
a distribution process).  It would be nice if <input> task included an echo
attribute that default to true, but could be set to false to not echo input (or
to display stars).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 6687 ***
creator: fugazi@zyx.net
